面试题05. 替换空格¶

https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/ti-huan-kong-ge-lcof/

请实现一个函数，把字符串 s 中的每个空格替换成"%20"。

示例 1：

输入：s = "We are happy."

输出："We%20are%20happy."

限制：

0 <= s 的长度 <= 10000

备注

  • 时间复杂度：O(n)

  • 空间复杂度：O(n)

class Solution(object):
    def replaceSpace(self, s):
        """
        :type s: str
        :rtype: str
        """
        rs  = []
        for c in s:
            if c == ' ':
                rs.append('%20')
            else:
                rs.append(c)
        return ''.join(rs)
